data.name: Xanguito Aventura
data.detailed_description:
Xanguito Aventura is a 2D platform game that aims to pay homage to the platform games of the 90s.

It is a game inspired by classic platforms such as Mario Bros, Sonic or Megaman.

It also has a mechanic of lives by hearts reminiscent of the classic Zelda.

The game mechanics are simple. Jump, double jump, and some power ups that will allow the character to shoot, fly or invincibility.

The game consists of 8 worlds with 5 levels each. That is, a total of 40 levels. Each level ends with a dungeon where you will have to face a final boss.

In addition, each level has a list of collectibles. These are, 100 coins and 5 flowers in each level. If the player collects all the items in the 5 levels of a world, an additional sixth level will be unlocked.

The difficulty of the game is high at the beginning. However, when a certain handling of the character is reached, the game is quite simple. As in the classics mentioned at the beginning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
